Name: THUNDEROUS SMITE
Description: The first time you hit with a melee weapon attackduring this spell's duration, your weapon rings withthunder that is audible within 300 feet of you, and theattack deals an extra 2d6 thunder damage to the target.Additionally, if the target is a creature, it must succeedon a Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet awayfrom you and knocked prone.
